document_data.name: Katakoro Shan
document_data.mainbody: '''Katakoro Shan''' was an enormous mountain range located in the [[Hordelands]]. It was part of the larger [[Yehimal]] mountains.
document_data.Geography: Katakoro Shan formed part of the borders of the nations of [[Khazari]] and [[Ra-Khati]], and also provided a formidable boundary between them and the [[Katakoro Plateau]]. Stretching along this mountain range was the [[Jumpa River Gorge]].
document_data.Description: Rugged peaks that reached an elevation of {{SI|19000|ft}} dominated this mountain range. Several glaciers of note could be found nestled between the high peaks, including the [[Katakoro Glacier]].
document_data.Inhabitants:
Many dangerous creatures inhabited the land surrounding Katakoro Shan, but the steep peaks kept them out of neighboring Khazari and Ra-Khati. and [[humanoid gargantua]].

A religious order could also be found based deep within this mountain range, known as the [[Order of Rainbow Monks]].{{cite book/Storm Riders|27}}
